sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Account: React.FC = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false); const [fullName, setFullName] = useState((user as any)?.fullName || ''); if (!user) { return (

Please log in to view your account

You need to be logged in to access your account information.

); } return (

Account Information

{/* Profile Information */}

Profile Information

{isEditing ? ( setFullName(e.target.value)} className="w-full p-3 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 bg-white dark:bg-primary-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-white rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500" placeholder="Enter your full name" /> ) : (
{fullName || 'Not set'}
)}
{user.username}
{user.email}
{user.id}
{new Date(user.createdAt).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}
{/* Account Statistics */}

Account Statistics

{(user as any).totalTests || 0}
Total Tests
{Math.round((user as any).averageWPM || 0)}
Average WPM
{Math.round((user as any).averageAccuracy || 0)}%
Average Accuracy
{Math.round((user as any).bestWPM || 0)}
Best WPM
{/* Account Actions */}

Account Actions

); }; export default Account;
